sentences.english: Spider-Man 3 is due to be released in May 2007.
sentences.chinese: “蜘蛛俠三”預計於2007年五月上市。

sentences.english: Two Spider man were cleaning the glasses of my libary.
sentences.chinese: 孜知書院大掃除，請來了兩個蜘蛛俠。

sentences.english: So, when it comes to a film about Spider-Man, I have certain expectations.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每一部有關蜘蛛俠的電影，我都會滿心期待。

sentences.english: He sells tickets like the Spiderman.
McDonald's happy meal with Spiderman action figure.
sentences.chinese: 一份有蜘蛛俠電影情節的麥當勞快樂套餐。

sentences.english: Spider-Man 3 suffers from a compete lack of imagination.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛俠3患有競爭缺乏想象力。

sentences.english: There were ladders like these everywhere on the buildings in newyork.
sentences.chinese: 紐約的建築到處都是這種梯子，方便蜘蛛俠？

sentences.english: Not unless she gives my Spiderman back.
sentences.chinese: 除非她把蜘蛛俠還給我。

sentences.english: But to quote Spider-Man, 'With great power comes great responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 但是拿蜘蛛俠的話來說，‘能力越大，責任越大’。

sentences.english: Here's another British lady hoping to score Spider-Man's love.
sentences.chinese: 又一位想獲得蜘蛛俠愛情的英國女子。

sentences.english: To quote Spider - Man's late uncle : "With great power comes great responsibility."
sentences.chinese: 正如蜘蛛俠的最新名言“攬大權者擔重任。”

sentences.english: A McDonald’s happy meal with Spiderman action figure.
sentences.chinese: 一份有蜘蛛俠電影情節的麥當勞快樂套餐。

sentences.english: E. g. In box-office terms, Spider was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 從票房收進來看，《蜘蛛俠》取得了巨大的勝利。

sentences.english: Curt Connors (Dylan Baker), his professor who eventually turns into The Lizard. Sorry, Venom fans.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛俠的教授很可能再次變成蜥蜴人。

sentences.english: "Spider-Man 3" made up for an otherwise soft crop of movies.
sentences.chinese: “蜘蛛俠3”彌補了一個軟否則作物的電影。

sentences.english: Check out how visual effects have improved since the first Spidey flick.
sentences.chinese: 退房如何改善視覺效果，自從第一次蜘蛛俠電影。

definition: to pick/to choose/to fight a duel
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
to tell others (a secret)/to divulge to an outsider/to be rumored
unofficial biography (as opposed to official dynastic biography)
